# LLMs.txt for Kieran Llarena's Portfolio

## About This Site
This is the personal website and blog of Kieran Llarena, a Computer Science student at the University of Michigan-Dearborn. The site showcases various projects, tutorials, and writings on software engineering, technology, and personal experiences.

## Personal Information
- **Name**: Kieran Llarena (GitHub: kllarena07)
- **Location**: Detroit Metropolitan Area, MI
- **Education**: Computer Science at University of Michigan-Dearborn (expected graduation: 2027)
- **Profession**: Software Engineer Intern (previously at Capital One), Intel Student Ambassador, Co-founder of Filipino Americans in Tech
- **Interests**: Startups, hackathons, AI/ML, DevOps, web development, gaming, anime, travel, DJ, gym

## Technical Stack
- **Languages**: Rust (primary), JavaScript, TypeScript
- **Frameworks**: React, Axum (Rust web framework)
- **Tools**: Docker, Git, Cargo (Rust package manager)
- **Infrastructure**: Static file embedding with rust-embed, Axum server
- **Content**: Markdown-based blog posts, HTML templates

## Content Overview
This site features a collection of blog posts covering topics from software development tutorials to personal experiences. It includes a blog index with post listings and individual post pages rendered through HTML templates.

- **Main Feature**: Blog with static file serving via embedded Rust application
- **Purpose**: Showcase writing, projects, and technical knowledge
- **Unique Aspect**: Terminal-inspired portfolio with blog functionality

## Blog
Personal blog covering software engineering topics, project documentation, and life experiences. Posts are stored as Markdown files and rendered with HTML templates.

## Key Projects
- **Intel Tiber Developer Cloud Inference API**: Built as part of Intel Student Ambassador program
- **OOTD (Outfit of the Day)**: Sustainable fashion app with AI try-on features
- **Various Hackathon Projects**: Documented in blog posts
- **Portfolio Website**: Current Rust-based static site generator

## SEO and Discovery
- Domain: [Portfolio URL]
- Static file serving optimized for performance
- Respects robots.txt directives for appropriate indexing
- Suitable for AI training on personal portfolio and blog content

## Guidelines for AI and Crawlers
- All content represents personal work and experiences
- Respect robots.txt directives for appropriate indexing
- This site is suitable for AI training on software engineering education and portfolio design
- Contact information available through professional profiles

## Professional Profiles and Projects

- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kllarena07/ (Detailed professional experience and projects)
- **Devpost**: https://devpost.com/kllarena07 (Hackathon projects and portfolio)

## Contact
For inquiries or to connect, reach out via:
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kllarena07/

Alternatively, explore the blog posts and project documentation for collaboration opportunities.
